guidances.tableDataDisplaying: To display cost prices data table, please select the location, then the cost price version. After that, it is possible additionally to filter by cost price pattern.
guidances.noBusinessUnits: No data cost price registration data to display because no business units available.
guidances.noCostPriceVersions: No cost prices version data available for selected business usit. Please select another business unit.
guidances.noDataToDisplay: No data satisfying to current filtering.
guidances.importedFromExcelDataSubmittingSucceeded: The cost prices registrations has been updated according to data from Excel file.

screenReaderOnly.tableDataLoadingInProgress: The cost prices table data is loading now. Please wait.
screenReaderOnly.excelFileExportingInProgress: The excel file exporting in progress. Please wait for a while

errors.businessUnitsDataRetrievingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the retrieving of business units data which requires for filtering.
errors.hasCostPriceVersionsDropDownListItemsFai: The malfunction has occurred during the retrieving of cost price versions data which required for filtering.
errors.tableDataRetrievingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the table data retrieving.
errors.excelDataParsingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during the reading of Excel file.

excelFileValidation.intro: The following violations has been detected in exported Excel file:
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_ID-NOT_EXISTS: The cost price registration ID is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_ID-EXISTS_BUT_NO: The cost price registration ID has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a string.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_ID-STRING_BUT_EM: The cost price registration ID has been specified with string, but this string is empty.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_ID-HAS_DUPLICATE: It the subsequent occurrence is this file of item with same ID.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_VALUE-NOT_EXISTS: The cost price registration value is required while not specified.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_VALUE-EXISTS_BUT: The cost price registration value has been specified but has {{ actualType }} type while must be a number.
excelFileValidation.COST_PRICE_REGISTRATION_VALUE-LESS_THAN_: Specified cost price value is less than zero.

errors.importedFromExcelDataSubmittingFailed: The malfunction has occurred during uploading of data import from the Excel file.
